trans-unit.source: Used within the template of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> to specify the location in the control's visual tree where the cells are to be added.
This class generates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> instances that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> visual tree.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter"></xref> class.
Called to arrange and size the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> object.
The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
The size of the control.
Clears the container reference for the specified cell.
This method sets the row owner value for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> to null.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> to clear.
The data item.
This value is not used.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> instance to contain a cell value.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> instance.
Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to check.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is (or is eligible to be) its own container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the data item that the row represents.
The data item that the row represents.
Called to remeasure a control.
The available size that this element can give to child elements.
The size of the control, up to the maximum specified by constraint.
It's invoked whenever application code or internal processes call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>.
Updates the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection has changed.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.

The event data from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
Updates the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter.Item*> property value has changed.
The previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter.Item*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter.Item*> property.
Called by the layout system to draw a horizontal line below the cells if horizontal grid lines are visible.
The drawing instructions for the cells.
This context is provided to the layout system.
Prepares the cell to display the specified item.
This method prepares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> for use and updates the column reference.
The cell to prepare.
The item to display.
